metadata.name: Pace Verso VIP Pass
metadata.description:
Pace Verso is the Web3 arm of Pace Gallery, a leading international gallery that combines its distinguished six-decade legacy with a reputation for innovation. Pace Verso produces boundary-pushing NFT projects by artists within and beyond Pace Gallery’s program. 

The Pace Verso VIP Pass provides exclusive digital offers related to Pace Verso’s NFT program and special access to events at Pace Gallery’s global locations. VIP Pass holders will enjoy whitelist status for selected future NFT drops on Pace Verso, early access to metaverse events by Pace Verso, and invitations to exclusive, international events, including exhibition previews, artist studio visits, private dinners, parties, lectures, and performances.
